3805672.title: [Bug Fix] Fix Authentication Issue in API Service
3805672.description:
This PR resolves an issue where authentication tokens were not refreshing properly, leading to session expiration and unauthorized errors.

Key Fixes:
- Adjusted token refresh logic to ensure seamless re-authentication.
- Improved session management to prevent unexpected logouts.
- Added logging to track authentication failures.

Expected Impact:
- Ensures users remain authenticated without disruptions.
- Improves security by enforcing correct token refresh mechanisms.
- Enhances logging for better debugging and monitoring.

Testing:
- Manual authentication flow testing in staging.
- Automated test cases for token refresh validation.
- Security review to ensure compliance.

3805673.title: [Improvement] Improve Logging in Cosmic Agent
3805673.description:
This PR enhances logging for the Cosmic agent service to improve debugging and monitoring capabilities.

Key Improvements:
- Added detailed logs for API requests and responses.
- Improved error handling logs for failed service calls.
- Structured log messages to facilitate analysis.

Expected Impact:
- Enhances visibility into Cosmic agent operations.
- Makes it easier to debug issues with detailed log traces.
- Reduces troubleshooting time by providing actionable insights.

Testing:
- Verified new log entries in test environments.
- Validated log format consistency across services.
- Conducted performance testing to ensure minimal overhead.

3805674.title: [Improvement] Update Security Policies in Office App
3805674.description:
This PR strengthens role-based access control (RBAC) and improves security logging in the Office application.

Key Enhancements:
- Refined user roles and permissions for better access control.
- Introduced audit logging for security-related events.
- Implemented stricter validation on API requests.

Expected Impact:
- Enhances security by preventing unauthorized access.
- Improves compliance with security policies and regulations.
- Provides better visibility into security-related events.

Testing:
- Role-based access control tests in different environments.
- Validation of security logs and audit trails.
- Internal security team review for compliance.

3805675.title: [Bug Fix] Resolve Memory Leak in Builder
3805675.description:
This PR fixes a memory leak issue in the Builder service that caused performance degradation over time.

Key Fixes:
- Identified and resolved unintentional object retention in memory.
- Optimized garbage collection to free up unused memory.
- Added monitoring tools to detect future memory leaks.

Expected Impact:
- Reduces memory consumption and improves system performance.
- Enhances stability of the Builder service.
- Prevents crashes due to excessive memory usage.

Testing:
- Memory profiling tests to verify garbage collection improvements.
- Load testing to measure performance enhancements.
- Continuous monitoring to detect potential memory leaks.

3805676.title: [Feature] Add AI-Based Error Handling
3805676.description:
This PR introduces an AI-based system to detect and handle API errors dynamically.

Key Features:
- AI-driven error detection and automatic recovery.
- Self-learning error mitigation strategies.
- Real-time monitoring and anomaly detection.

Expected Impact:
- Reduces downtime by automatically handling errors.
- Improves API reliability with proactive issue resolution.
- Enhances developer efficiency by reducing manual debugging.

Testing:
- AI model validation using historical error data.
- Real-time testing with simulated API failures.
- Continuous learning and adaptation monitoring.
